caption:
Refresher: Responsive desire emerges in response to pleasure or arousal, whereas spontaneous desire emerges in anticipation of pleasure or arousal. 

Libido is not a static experience. It’s normal for it to ebb, flow, and fluctuate.

These are just a few examples of the many ways in which libido can change over time. If you experience libido changes, please know that’s to be expected over time. If you have concerns about your libido, you can check out the book I co-authored with @drjennifervencill called, Desire: An Inclusive Guide to Navigating Libido Differences in Relationships.
